name: iPhone XR
description: The iPhone XR features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display and advanced camera system with 12MP TrueDepth front camera.

name: Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a powerful smartphone with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and 64MP camera.

name: Pixel 5
description: The Google Pixel 5 is a compact and powerful smartphone with a 5.8-inch OLED display and 12.2MP camera.

name: AirPods Pro
description: The AirPods Pro are wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and a customizable fit for all-day comfort.

name: Galaxy Buds Pro
description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro are wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, improved sound quality, and long battery life.

name: Beats Solo Pro
description: The Beats Solo Pro are over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and exceptional sound quality.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II are noise-cancelling headphones with a comfortable fit and exceptional sound quality.

name: Surface Laptop 4
description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 is a premium laptop with a 13.5-inch Touchscreen display and 11th Gen Intel Core processors.

name: MacBook Air M2
description: The MacBook Air M2 is a slim and powerful laptop with a 13.3-inch Retina display and the Apple M2 chip.

name: ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a durable laptop with a 14-inch Full HD display and Intel Core processors.

name: iPad Pro
description: The iPad Pro is a powerful tablet with a Liquid Retina display and the A12Z Bionic chip.

name: Galaxy Tab S7
description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 is apremium tablet with a 11-inch Super AMOLED display and the Snapdragon 865+ processor.

name: Nexus 7
description: The Google Nexus 7 is a compact and affordable tablet with a 7-inch IPS display and the Android operating system.

name: Apple Watch Series 6
description: The Apple Watch Series 6 is a smartwatch with a always-on display, fitness tracking, and cellular connectivity.

name: Galaxy Watch 3
description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 3 is a smartwatch with advanced fitness tracking, ECG monitoring, and long battery life.

name: Fitbit Sense
description: The Fitbit Sense is a advanced fitness tracker with ECG monitoring, skin temperature tracking, and long battery life.

name: Vivosmart 5
description: The Garmin Vivosmart 5 is a fitness tracker with advanced fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and long battery life.

name: Bose SoundTouch 300
description: The Bose SoundTouch 300 is a soundbar with powerful, room-filling sound and built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Samsung HW-Q60T
description: The Samsung HW-Q60T is a soundbar with powerful, room-filling sound and built-in Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Sonos Beam
description: The Sonos Beam is a compact soundbar with powerful, room-filling sound and built-in Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Bose Home Speaker 500
description: The Bose Home Speaker 500 is a smart speaker with powerful, room-filling sound and built-in Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Echo Studio
description: The Amazon Echo Studio is a smart speaker with powerful, 3D sound and built-in Alexa and Zigbee smart home hub.

name: Roku Ultra
description: The Roku Ultra is a streaming device with 4K resolution, HDR, and a quad-core processor for fast and smooth performance.

name: Fire TV Stick 4K
description: The Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K is a streaming device with 4K resolution, Alexa Voice Remote, and access to thousands of streaming channels.

name: Chromecast with Google TV
description: The Google Chromecast with Google TV is a streaming device with a built-in Google Assistant, 4K resolution, and access to thousands of streaming channels.

name: Sony Bravia X900H
description: The Sony Bravia X900H is a 4K HDR TV with a large 55-inch display and powerful sound system.

name: LG OLED CX
description: The LG OLED CX is a 4K HDR TV with a large 55-inch OLED display and powerful sound system.

name: Samsung Q900T
description: The Samsung Q900T is a 8K HDR TV with a large 55-inch QLED display and powerful sound system.
